sentences: The Secretariat introduced this item (FCCC/SBSTA/2009/5, 6, 7, INF.5, MISC.9/Rev.1, MISC.10, and FCCC/TP/2009/2).
The CONVENTION ON BIOLOGICAL DIVERSITY (CBD) reported on the Expert Group on Biodiversity and Climate Change.
The IPCC reported on the contribution of the Task Group on Data and Scenario Support for Impact and Climate Analysis.
The International Federation of Agricultural Producers, for FARMERS NGOs, proposed a programme of work on agriculture.
Kishan Kumarsingh (Trinidad and Tobago) and Don Lemmen (Canada) will co-chair a contact group.
